com.tymeac.base

Class TyStatsThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.tymeac.base.TyStatsThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class TyStatsThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Tymeac stats writter thread. Writing can block or crash, therefore, writing is done in this thread. Two stats writing methods are supported: On request and at shut down. There is no use for this thread once it completes a request, therefore, it dies.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
